com.google.gwt.dev.util.editdistance
Class GeneralEditDistances

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.dev.util.editdistance.GeneralEditDistances

public class GeneralEditDistances
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of instance generators for the GeneralEditDistance interface.

Method Summary

          Compares two strings for at most one insert/delete/substitute difference.

Method Detail

atMostOneError

public static int atMostOneError(java.lang.CharSequence s1,
                                 java.lang.CharSequence s2)
Compares two strings for at most one insert/delete/substitute difference. Since operations cannot be composed, a simple case analysis is possible.

Parameters:
s1 - one string to be compared
s2 - the other string to be compared
Returns:
Levenshtein edit distance if no greater than 1; otherwise, more than 1

getLevenshteinDistance

public static GeneralEditDistance getLevenshteinDistance(java.lang.CharSequence pattern)
Generates an GeneralEditDistance engine for a particular pattern string based on Levenshtein distance. Caller must ensure that the pattern does not change (consider using pattern.toString() if necessary) as long as the generated object is to be used.

Parameters:
pattern - a string from which distance computations are desired
Returns:
an engine for computing Levenshtein distances from that pattern
